title: Riot's server is acting up again!
body: Riot's server is preventing me from entering matches. I'm not going back to LeaverBuster because of your mistake Riot. Stop giving me the Failed to Connect message and let me play the game. This is a violation of my rights and I'm sick of it. You keep taking my posts down when I'm proving that there is nothing wrong with my wireless router.

replies.body: It's not my network. It's working fine and I played GameRanger earlier today.
While you may not experience connectivity issues outside of League, the article contains solid steps that could resolve your connectivity issues.
There wasn't anything that could help me.

Since the issue you're experiencing can be caused by a lot of factors, and you weren't able to resolve it with the connection guide, I recommend reaching out to our tech specialists by [creating a ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

If you're able to attach a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool,](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) you'll expedite your service. Let me know if you have any questions.

Have you tried everything? If yes;

[Grant League permission to run on your computer!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Annie_3.jpg

Let us know if this works.
